posts.postText:
Which game do you think is better? Here's a list of some pros and cons i have found myself.

Crysis 1
Pros: The original
Moddable
Better Graphics
Better story(?)
Cons: Confusing controls on console
More outdated engine subversion

Crysis 2 

Pros: More updated
Less bugs
Updated AI and Mechanics
Good story
Great Multiplayer
Better control system

Cons:

Not moddable (as far as I know.)
graphics lower than the first
not as many destructible surfaces.
Not as many options for powers
and probably some more that don't come to mind at the moment.


What do you think?
I played warhead and had decent fun with it. I played the leaked beta of the second, and it turned me off so much I haven't bought it.

Crysis 2 doesn't need to be modifiable, the whole CryEngine 3 SDK is available for free, (I think) it comes with all the Crysis 2 assets. 

I like Crysis's gameplay a whole lot better than the original, a lot less sandboxy but the levels still branched off with different options to suit different playstyles. That, and the AI is a lot better as well.
